user_query: I am a finance student and I want to learn more about Ethereum. Can you fetch the last mined Ethereum block number and provide me with the list of ethereum addresses created with an account? It would be great if you could also give me the historical rates of currency conversion from USD to ETH for a specific date, let's say January 1, 2022.

TaskList.description: Fetch the last mined Ethereum block number.
Retrieve the list of Ethereum addresses created with a specific account.
Get the historical rates of currency conversion from USD to ETH for January 1, 2022.
